original_text:
But before they turned from what they craved,
    even while the food was still in their mouths,
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 그들의 욕심을 버리지 아니하여 그들의 먹을 것이 아직 그들의 입에 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: But before they turned from what they craved,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들이 갈망하던 것에서 돌이키기 전에,

sentences.original_text: even while the food was still in their mouths,
sentences.korean_translation: 음식이 아직 입 안에 있을 때에도,
